name: PureGlow
overview: Artisanal candle brand creating hand-poured soy candles inspired by Nordic hygge. Each candle is crafted in small batches using natural ingredients, designed to transform any space into a cozy sanctuary of warmth and tranquility.
targetAudience: Women aged 28-45 who value self-care, creating cozy home environments, and artisanal products. Likely interested in wellness, interior design, and Scandinavian lifestyle concepts.

voice.tone: Warm, poetic, and intimate. We speak like a cherished friend sharing secrets to a cozy evening at home.
examples: As the first flame catches, watch the room transform. Notes of cedar and vanilla unfurl slowly, wrapping your evening in warmth.
Hand-poured in small batches, each candle holds 60 hours of hyggeâ€”enough to carry you through countless cozy evenings.

doStatements: Always describe scents using layered, sensory language
Reference the hand-crafted, small-batch nature of products
Connect candles to moments, rituals, and emotions
Use Scandinavian concepts like hygge authentically
dontStatements: Avoid comparing to mass-market candle brands
Never describe scents as simply 'strong' or 'light'
